name: Mad Skies!
description:
A simple plane fighting game. Survive as long as you can. It won't be easy!

Was originally made for a school project, but I decided to put a little more work into the game and make it available for everyone to play.

-------------controls------------------

ARROW KEYS - controlling the plane

SHIFT - speed boost

SPACE - shoot

------------------------------------------

Only tested on Windows! - you should be able to just unzip and play!
